Structs/NotBeforeClaim.html#/s:3JWT14Not.name: value

Structs/IssuedAtClaim.html#/s:3JWT13Issu.name: value

Structs/AudienceClaim.html#/s:3JWT13Audi.name: value

Structs/IssuerClaim.html#/s:3JWT11Issuer.name: value

Structs/IssuerClaim.html.name: IssuerClaim
Structs/IssuerClaim.html.abstract: Identifies by which application a Claim is issued

Structs/AudienceClaim.html.name: AudienceClaim
Structs/AudienceClaim.html.abstract: Identifies the destination application of the Claim

Structs/IssuedAtClaim.html.name: IssuedAtClaim
Structs/IssuedAtClaim.html.abstract: Identifies the date at which a Claim was issued

Structs/IDClaim.html.name: IDClaim
Structs/IDClaim.html.abstract: Identifies the date at which a Claim was issued

Structs/JWTError.html.name: JWTError

Structs/JWTHeader.html.name: JWTHeader
Structs/JWTHeader.html.abstract: The header (details) used for signing and processing this JSON Web Signature

Structs/ExpirationClaim.html.name: ExpirationClaim
Structs/ExpirationClaim.html.abstract: Identifies the final date when a Claim becomes invalid

Structs/NotBeforeClaim.html.name: NotBeforeClaim
Structs/NotBeforeClaim.html.abstract: Identifies the first date at which a Claim becomes valid

Protocols/JWTVerifiable.html#/s:3JWT13JW.name: verify()

Protocols/JWTAlgorithm.html#/s:3JWT12JWT.name: sign(_:)

Protocols/JWTAlgorithm.html#/s:3JWT12JWT.name: verify(_:signs:)
Protocols/JWTAlgorithm.html#/s:3JWT12JWT.abstract: Returns true if the signature was creating by signing the plaintext.

Protocols/JWTClaim.html.name: JWTClaim
Protocols/JWTClaim.html.abstract: A claim is a codable top-level property that can be verified against the current circumstances

Protocols.html#/s:3JWT10JWTPayloadP.name: JWTPayload
Protocols.html#/s:3JWT10JWTPayloadP.abstract: A JWT payload is a Publically Readable set of claims
